description.message: This extension can set up proxy for each host you have visited.

proxy_server_desc.message: Configure your proxy server. One proxy server a line. Will auto try next one if the bef

white_list_desc.message: When the whitelist mode is turned on, the domain names outside the whitelist will go through the proxy

black_list_desc.message: When the blacklist mode is turned on, only the domain name in the blacklist will go through the proxy.

mode_system_desc.message: Use the proxy settings of system

mode_white_list_desc.message: Domain outside white list will use proxy

mode_black_list_desc.message: Domain inside black list will use proxy
